name: UITableViewDropPlaceholderContext
desc: An object for tracking a placeholder cell that you added to your table during a drop operation.

items.name: func commitInsertion(dataSourceUpdates: (IndexPath) -> Void) -> Bool
items.desc: Exchanges the placeholder cell for a cell with the final content.

items.name: func deletePlaceholder() -> Bool
items.desc: Removes an unneeded placeholder cell from the table view.

items.name: var dragItem: UIDragItem
items.desc: The drag item represented by the placeholder cell.
